channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #es @ 1442637677942251523
item.description:
🙀 Volvieron los lunes de memes 🙀
💚💜 Compartí este meme de la suerte para que nunca te falten datos abiertos, de calidad y con perspectiva de género🙏🏽 https://t.co/lL4JAq7k6s

item.title: #en @ 1442627877946548224
item.description: I used to spend a lot of my time doing activism about #OpenData, because I thought people weren't sharing data out of indifference. But I realized that basic education about #OpenData is inadequate and causing #ClosedData. I am going to spend more of my time doing education.

item.title: #es @ 1442605257750564867
item.description:
#COVID19 #OpenData 🇵🇪 #Hoy 27Set MINSA reportará 19 fallecidos últimas 24h Promedio diario últimos 7 días: 30
🙏Regiones "n" días consecutivos CERO fallecidos Tacna: 11 días Ayacucho: 7 días Ucayali: 7 días Huancavelica: 5 días Pasco: 5 días
#SigamosCuidándonos #Vacunate https://t.co/RR1Y95vOG8

item.title: #en @ 1442599136080003081
item.description:
Data is knowledge !
After my intervention at Committee last summer, I am happy to report that the City has finally advanced an Open Data portal for housing and homelessness services
This portal will be updated monthly is key to advancing evidence bases solutions in our City 🏠 https://t.co/UbL321HIcE

item.description: Early Modern Chinese depictions of visitors to the court. 清謝遂職貢圖 https://t.co/84nxxd1mJu https://t.co/XdLKq9rqjp

item.title: #en @ 1442575032123752450
item.description:
Kristi Kline was among the @USGS employees who led the implementation of the free and open data policy. She’s now the EROS Satellite and Ground Systems Operations Branch.
Hear Barb and Kristi on this podcast: https://t.co/20fEr9aA4r https://t.co/CR9rC1ivNC

item.title: #en @ 1442575027291910148
item.description:
The free and open data policy unlocked the world’s longest continuously collected Earth observation record in 2008 and led to an explosion in innovation.
The policy’s champion? Barb Ryan
More on Barb: https://t.co/FltMIAMnnr More on the policy: https://t.co/qfoAahLKkR https://t.co/jflJ3gxIVL

item.title: #en @ 1442549512342360067
item.description:
Attending a #MicroplasticData workshop today and tomorrow with @UW_Ecohydrology and @water_institute. I always learn so much from the breakout groups and will be tweeting out my main learnings live.
Key topics: data standardization, harmonization, schemas, FAIR, OA, ++

item.title: #en @ 1442547165260394500
item.description: #OpenData isn’t the playing field leveler for minorities and vulnerable populations. Open data is showing the wrong ppl where the buried treasure is and targeting those populations. Stop the lie!

item.title: #es @ 1442536854419509248
item.description:
En el marco del Día Internacional del Derecho a Saber, @jorgerure estará en el foro Datos Abiertos, Acceso a la Información y Desapariciones en México para hablar de la experiencia de Data Cívica en el tema.
¡No se lo pierdan! Mañana, 12:00 p.m. #EnVivo redes de @IniSinaloa https://t.co/IKhLd3WFIQ

item.title: #en @ 1442534172229193733
item.description:
3. By making improvements while maintaining so much similarity to its predecessors, the continuous record of the Landsat mission is foundational to remote sensing and Earth Observation.
Made freely available in 2009, the Landsat mission is a major success story for #OpenData https://t.co/JDDAGLI15V

item.title: #en @ 1442510971352674308
item.description:
About Ocean Protocol: We are an expanding ecosystem of data suppliers, consumers, stakers, and community developers. Our aim is to build tools for people to reclaim control of their data and unleash an open data economy.
Visit https://t.co/6tquSNr2QM for more information.

item.description: Exciting to see the State Dept release its new data strategy. Another promising step for implementation of the #EvidenceAct and #FedDataStrategy in our federal government!! https://t.co/Q9Fo4nhoEx #opendata

item.title: #cs @ 1442467623166377997
item.description: Dostupnější a levnější léčebné konopí. Předepisování na eRecept. Více pěstitelů. Vývoz do zahraničí. Dále možnost blokace stránek s nelegální nabídkou léků. Elektronický očkovací průkaz. A open data @SUKLcz. To přináší dnes prezidentem podepsaná novela. https://t.co/uYj5LsSNEV

item.title: #fr @ 1442434350243631104
item.description: "L’ouverture des données permet de construire une vision où l’Etat développe une logique de plateforme de l’intérêt général", dit Amélie de Montchalin, en présentant les feuilles de routes ministérielles sur les données publiques. C'est le retour de l'Etat plate-forme finalement?

item.title: #en @ 1442428943408246786
item.description: The pandemic led to 97M more poor people in 2020. This year, low-income countries are expected to see further increases in poverty. What kinds of economic policies can help change these numbers? Learn more ahead of our Annual Meetings. https://t.co/r96ckQgfzW

item.title: #en @ 1442428810348011533

item.title: #en @ 1442412722923220992
item.description: Open Jobs Observatory: Labour markets are being transformed by tech, health, environmental & policy shocks. Policymakers, educators, firms & workers need up-to-date, relevant and open data to inform their response. OJO sets out to provide this for the UK. https://t.co/DO7uuNVpOA

item.title: #en @ 1442312664722468866
item.description:
An important concept and question to ask ourselves:
".. zombie data: datasets that have been published without any purpose or clear use case in mind"
Question: Do we still have zombie data in our #opendata portals?
@laurenfklein & @kanarinka in “Data Feminism”
#SundayReads

item.title: #es @ 1442277917715804160
item.description: Al mundo no se le cambia con tonterías @BJAlcaldia! Pá cambiar al mundo hay que despertar a los niños, no adormecerlos. Ustedes talaron 1472 árboles en el 2019 según datos abiertos. De qué sirve plantar un árbol y llenar sus raices con papel y tinta, en lugar de tierra y respeto? https://t.co/WXDKckN56c

item.description: @SSalud_mx En los datos abiertos de hoy hay 275,450 defunciones confirmadas, y no 275,446 como dice en su informe técnico diario. Ya les pasa todos los días 🙄

item.title: #ja @ 1442177285864316930
item.description:
ここに渋谷駅周辺の3Dデータが有ったんで，日射解析してみた。PLATEAUのデータ使ってもできる。 https://t.co/QvcSB1vnxb
.epwの観測データの影響が大きいから，これを確認してからやらないと曇りの日とか雨の日を参照することになってしまい解析の意味がなくなる。 #LadybugTools https://t.co/RvP7aRhF7C

item.title: #en @ 1441863318579286021
item.description:
@mattwridley It's funny. But in reality researchers were way worse just 50 years ago. We have a ton of studies with 40 people, no replication, lots of manipulation and no open data.
Open data is not the norm yet, but it's getting better. Even now most lying researchers have "lost their data"

item.description:
Archaeologists using machine learning: take a look at the standards from other researchers: open data, open code, reproducible.
